<h2>$ cat welcome!</h2> <p>Hi all. I received my PhD from the <a href="http://cin.ufpe.br">Federal University of Pernambuco</a>, Brazil, under supervision of <a href="https://sites.google.com/a/cin.ufpe.br/castor">Fernando Castor</a>. During 2013-2014, I was a visiting scholar at the <a href="binghamton.edu">State University of New York</a>, working with <a href="http://www.cs.binghamton.edu/~davidl">Yu David Liu</a>. I&rsquo;m currently a Postdoctoral Research Fellow at the <a href="http://cin.ufpe.br">Federal University of Pernambuco</a>, Brazil.</p> <p>During my Ph.D. study, I devoted several efforts to understand how parallel programming techniques impact energy consumption. For instance, since we are moving from 2 to 32, 64 or even 128 cores, how can we save <strong>energy</strong> knowing that a 32 core processor consumes more <strong>power</strong> than one with 2 cores? My work on this topic, which was presented in a number of <a href="/publications">publications</a>, is synthesized in my Ph.D. thesis, entitled &ldquo;A Refactoring Approach to Improve Energy Consumption of Parallel Software Systems&rdquo;.</p> <p>Today my research interests are a bit broader, including performance &amp; energy consumption (<em>e.g.</em>, <a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/fase2015.pdf">FASE'2015</a>), concurrent programming (<em>e.g.</em>, <a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/oopsla2014.pdf">OOPSLA'2014</a>), social aspects of software enginering (<em>e.g.</em>, <a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/msr2014.pdf">MSR'2014</a>), big data analytics (<em>e.g.</em>, <a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/msr2015.pdf">MSR'2015</a>), and refactoring (<em>e.g.</em>, <a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/greens2015.pdf">GREENS'2015</a>).</p> <p>I am interested in new colleagues at all levels: undergraduates, graduate students, and postdocs. If your research interests overlap with mine, please drop me a letter. You can reach me at <a href="&#x6d;&#x61;&#x69;&#x6c;&#x74;&#111;&#58;&#x67;&#x68;&#108;&#112;&#x40;&#x63;&#x69;&#110;&#x2e;&#x75;&#x66;&#112;&#101;&#46;&#98;&#114;&#46;">&#103;&#x68;&#108;&#112;&#x40;&#x63;&#105;&#110;&#46;&#117;&#x66;&#x70;&#101;&#x2e;&#x62;&#114;&#46;</a></p> <h3>$ cat recent_pubs</h3> <ul> <li>Paper to appear at <a href="http://2015.splashcon.org/track/plateau2015">PLATEAU 2015</a> &ndash; &ldquo;<a href="http://gustavopinto.github.io/lost+found/jss_2015.pdf">A Large-Scale Study on the Usage of Java&rsquo;s Concurrent Programming Constructs.</a>&rdquo;</li> <li>Paper to appear at <a href="http://www.journals.elsevier.com/journal-of-systems-and-software/">JSS 2015</a> &ndash;
